channel.title: How to change options on players?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm in need of one tut. Yes, I did try to search etc, but couldn't find, maybe I search wrong things? I dont know. Anyway, what I need is, a tut where its explained how to change options.
Eg, if lower level clicks on higher level, first option is 'Trade', but if higher level clicks on lower - first is 'Attack'.
Also, I need a tut how to change options at all. Like, if there is 'Follow', how to change to...lets say..'Stats'?
So what I need is: How to switch places for options and How to change options.
Thanks already. [br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 11:06:35 AM[/size][hr]Anyone knows a tut like this?:/[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 11:19:04 AM[/size][hr]Bump :|[br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 02:27:48 PM[/size][hr]Bump.

In client.java search for

outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
